summary: This document contains AT&T wireless subscriber information records for accounts associated with Scott Borgerson, showing him as the financial liable party for multiple phone lines/accounts, including lines for 'G MAX', 'N AH BORGERSON' (likely Noah Borgerson), 'G WIFI', and 'SCOTT G BORGERSON'. It appears to be a financial record produced as part of the Epstein case investigation.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Listed as the financial liable party and billing party for multiple AT&T wireless accounts, with customer relationship starting in 2004.

persons.name: Noah Borgerson
persons.context: Appears as a user on one of the AT&T accounts under the name 'N AH BORGERSON' with service starting in September 2019.

connections.description: Scott Borgerson is the financial liable party for a wireless account used by Noah Borgerson, suggesting a financial responsibility relationship.

keyFacts: Scott Borgerson is the financial responsible party for multiple AT&T wireless accounts dating back to 2004.
The accounts include lines for 'G MAX', 'G WIFI', 'SCOTT G BORGERSON', and 'N AH BORGERSON' (Noah Borgerson).
This appears to be financial record evidence collected as part of the Epstein investigation, showing communication infrastructure.
The document was produced by AT&T on June 17, 2020, in response to legal requests.
The records show ongoing financial relationships and account management spanning over 16 years.
